text:
Omg. Can believe I didn't try this before. It is so so so good. My family and I ordered the Hainanese curry R1 and the Merak Curry R3 . The first is so so delicious and the second has the sweet and savoury that is well balanced. Can't decide which I like more.

Really hits the spot. Highly recommend! And the utensils are super clean which I appreciate
Opens till 3am, great quiet supper spot. Must enter by mall main entrance as the side entrance is locked after 10pm.

Excellent service and fantastic taste.
Tamarind chrysanthemum tea here is a must try one !

Great tarts and drinks for a lazy Saturday morning with the boy üòç
Huge cup of tea and we loved the apple crumble
The Kopi is good as usual. The puffs are a little oily. Service staff is good especially Deniss.
